00014 // Standard includes
00015 #include <ServiceControl/UserFriendlyAPI.h>
00016
00017 namespace Omiscid {
00018
00025 class RegisterThread : public Thread
00026 {
00027 public:
00028     /* @brief Create a new thread that will register a thread
00029      * give its number
00030      */
00031     RegisterThread(unsigned int MyNumber);
00032
00033     /* @brief destructor (all destructor must be virtual !) */
00034     virtual ~RegisterThread();
00035
00036     /* @brief The Run procedure of the thread, so what he must do */
00037     void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE Run();
00038
00039     static AtomicCounter NbRegistered;
00040     static Event NewServiceIsRegistered;
00042 private:
00043     unsigned int Number;
00044 };
00045
00046 } // namespace Omiscid
